content:
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-pkg-tools/pull/41 implements the "namespace fallback" mechanism discussed at the last meeting. Additionally, I have synced packages from the webassembly registry so all the wasi: packages are now conform to the cncf oci format

ref(*)!: Refactors loader to use the new common package (subset of #34) by lann 路 Pull Request #41 路 bytecodealliance/wasm-pkg-tools
This includes a subset of #34 to prevent conflicts with some work I'm doing in parallel. Edit: It turned out to be just as easy to do some of the parallel work in this PR rather than churn through ...
